DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety Dapoxetine/Sildenafil 30/50 mg film-coated tablet treatment men premature ejaculation erectile dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Safety Dapoxetine/Sildenafil Combination Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: During 4-weeks treatment period , patient take one Dapoxetine/Sildenafil 30/50 mg film coat tablet 1-3 hour sexual intercourse . Study drug use 1 tablet every 24 hour treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1864 year old men , Participants must heterosexual male stable monogamous sexual relationship female partner least 6 month continue throughout study , Clinical diagnosis erectile dysfunction , IIEF score ≤21 , Premature Ejaculation Diagnostic Tool ( PEDT ) score must ≥11 Patients lifelong PE acquire PE accord description International Society Sexual Medicine ( ISSM ) , The patient partner must sexual intercourse twice week duration study , Commitment comply study protocol , Patients sign inform consent form ( ICF ) .
